channel.title: How to change the login look of delta client?
channel.description:
are there any tutorials out there that can help me change the look of the login menu? i hate the old stony one and here are the questions i have,
-how can i move the Username imput -how can i move the password imput -how can i move the Login button -how can i change the grafix of the login button -how can i change the grafix of the cancle button how can i change the background of the login box. -how can i remove the welcome to blablabla and have just login(like without the existing player screen)
any help would be helpful

item.title: How to change the login look of delta client?
item.dc:creator: @Thanks Thanks
item.description:
@Thanks wrote:

to change the look of the login menu all you have to do is remove the background picture in your client folderâ€¦and replace it with what you want.

Teamviewer me if you would like to.

Read full topic
item.source: How to change the login look of delta client?
